Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[telegram] <N21_0> This partnership will progressively bring amazing new features to the Komodo community. These include:
Creation of a stable coin based on legal banking debts, through our own Komodo Asset Chain.
Migration of our security token to a Komodo asset chain.
Create a line of credit with $KMD in collateral.
Standard credit/debit card allowing you to buy natively in Komodo.
Further integration of a Komodo Wallet with multi-sig and others features.
